label: ProductBatchCertification
comment: The process of certifying that a certain product batch has passed performance and quality assurance tests, or qualification requirements stipulated in regulations.

objectProperties.comment: A referenced standard applicable to this product batch certification.
An assertion, expressed as text, for this product batch certification, such as a claim that this product is free from gluten.
The code specifying the assertion for this product batch certification, such as a claim that a product is free from gluten.
A referenced location related to this product batch certification.
An agency, expressed as text, responsible for this product batch certification.
A sustainability assertion specified for this product batch certification.
A standard, expressed as text, used for this product batch certification.

referencedBy.comment: A certification applicable to this product batch.
